snippet: The northern Sinai Peninsula has seen a buildup of troops and military hardware since a fatal attack Sunday on Egyptian soldiers who were about to break their Ramadan fast.
abstract: Egypt's northern Sinai Peninsula has seen a buildup of troops and military hardware since a fatal attack on Egyptian soldiers who were about to break their Ramadan fast.
lead_paragraph: The northern Sinai Peninsula has seen a buildup of troops and military hardware since a fatal attack Sunday on Egyptian soldiers who were about to break their Ramadan fast.

headline.main: After Sinai Killings, Cairo Tightens Grip on a Neglected Region
headline.print_headline: After Sinai Killings, Cairo Tightens Grip on a Neglected Region
